user.title: Add Cover Time Based
user.description:
Configure a time-based cover with position maps.

**Entity Options:**
- **Use Existing Cover**: Control an existing cover entity
- **Use Individual Switches**: Control via separate open/close/stop entities

**Time Map Options:**
- **Simple Mode**: Enter total time and positions (easier)
- **Advanced Mode**: Use JSON format for precise control

JSON examples:
- Opening: {opening_example}
- Closing: {closing_example}

**Note**: Tilt times are optional - leave empty if not needed.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Cover Time Based
reconfigure.description:
Update the configuration for this cover.

**Entity Options:**
- **Use Existing Cover**: Control an existing cover entity
- **Use Individual Switches**: Control via separate open/close/stop entities

Time maps define position at specific time intervals in JSON format:
- Opening example: {opening_example}
- Closing example: {closing_example}
